footer.tagline_p: Empowering farmers with cutting-edge technology, expert knowledge, and a supportive community to achieve sustainable success.
footer.newsletter_p: Get weekly farming tips and updates delivered to your inbox.

hero.title: Modernizing Indian Agriculture with Intelligence and Technology
hero.subtitle: Your comprehensive platform for farm management, tool rentals, and market access.

growing_future_subtitle: Join thousands of farmers transforming their operations with AI-powered insights, modern tools, and real-time market intelligence.

about.title: Revolutionizing Agriculture Through Innovation
about.p1: KrishiSanjivni was born from a simple vision: to bridge the gap between traditional farming wisdom and modern technology. We understand the daily challenges farmers face, from unpredictable weather to fluctuating market prices.
about.p2: Our platform combines cutting-edge AI, real-time data analytics, and a deep understanding of agricultural practices to deliver solutions that truly make a difference. We're not just building software; we're cultivating a community of forward-thinking farmers.
about.feature_trusted_subtitle: Bank-grade security protecting your data and transactions
about.feature_community_subtitle: Built with farmers, for farmers, supporting local communities

value.farmer_centric_p: Built by understanding real challenges faced by farmers in their daily operations
value.technology_driven_p: Leveraging AI and modern tools to provide actionable insights and solutions
value.trusted_partner_p: Supporting sustainable and profitable farming practices across communities
value.eco_friendly_p: Promoting sustainable practices that protect our environment for future generations

features.title: Comprehensive Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to modernize your farming operations

feature.tools_p: Book agricultural tools and machinery for sowing, harvesting, and all farm operations
feature.warehouse_p: Find and book warehouse space with details on capacity and storage conditions
feature.soil_p: Log soil checks, get NPK/pH readings, and receive fertilizer recommendations
feature.market_p: View local Mandi prices and crop demand insights in real-time
feature.finance_p: Guidance on credit cards, insurance, subsidies, and government schemes
feature.weather_p: Hyper-local weather updates, pest alerts, and irrigation guidance
feature.ai_p: Smart chatbot providing step-by-step guidance, answering queries, and assisting with administrative questions 24/7

testimonial.section_subtitle: Hear from the growing community that is achieving success with KrishiSanjivni.
testimonial.amit_feedback: The tools booking system saved me so much time and money this harvest season. Everything was efficient and reliable.
testimonial.sunita_feedback: Real-time weather alerts and the soil check recommendations have drastically improved my yield. Highly recommended!
testimonial.ravi_feedback: The Market Prices feature is a game-changer. I finally know the best time to sell my crop for maximum profit.
testimonial.priya_feedback: Access to government schemes and financial advice has helped me secure a loan to expand my operations. Thank you!
testimonial.rajesh_feedback: The AI assistant is fantastic for instant pest and disease identification. It's like having an expert agronomist in my pocket.

community_page.mission_description: To build a supportive network where farmers can freely exchange knowledge, find solutions to challenges, and discover innovative practices to improve their yields and sustainability.

features.ask_questions: Ask questions and get answers from experienced peers.
features.share_experiences: Share your own farming successes and lessons learned.
features.find_solutions: Find practical solutions for crop management and soil health.
features.stay_updated: Stay updated on the latest agricultural trends and technologies.

community_page.join_description: Your voice matters. Start a new discussion, reply to a topic, or introduce yourself to the community.

ai_showcase.subtitle: Get instant, expert-level answers to your farming questions 24/7. Our AI chatbot is trained on decades of agricultural knowledge and best practices.
ai_showcase.feature_instant_desc: Get answers in seconds, not hours
ai_showcase.feature_natural_desc: Chat naturally like with a human expert
ai_showcase.bot_greeting: Hello! I'm your AI farming assistant. I can help with soil testing, crop management, pest control, and much more. What would you like to know?
ai_showcase.bot_response_p1: Great question! Based on your location and current soil conditions, I'd recommend...
ai_showcase.bot_tip_body: Consider conducting a soil test first to get the most accurate recommendations for your specific conditions.
ai_showcase.q_plant_time: What's the best time to plant corn in my region?
ai_showcase.q_soil_nitrogen: How do I improve soil nitrogen levels?
ai_showcase.q_wheat_rust: What are the signs of wheat rust disease?
ai_showcase.q_tomato_irrigation: When should I irrigate my tomato crops?

chatbot.intro_line2: Ask me about farming tools, warehouses, soil analysis, or any farming questions!

community_section.title: Join Our Thriving Community
community_section.subtitle: Connect, learn, and grow with thousands of farmers and agricultural professionals

features.expert_network_description: Connect with agricultural experts, agronomists, and successful farmers from around the world.
features.community_forums_description: Participate in discussions, ask questions, and share your farming experiences with peers.
features.knowledge_library_description: Access thousands of articles, guides, and research papers on modern farming techniques.
features.success_stories_description: Get inspired by real farmers who transformed their operations using our platform.

community_section.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of farmers who are already benefiting from our community and resources.

hero_section.subtitle: Join our thriving community of farmers and agricultural experts. Access cutting-edge tools, expert insights, and AI-powered solutions to maximize your harvest.

services_section.title: Empowering Farmers with Smart Solutions
services_section.subtitle: KrishiSanjivni simplifies every aspect of modern agriculture ‚Äî from soil health to storage and AI assistance.

features.smart_tools_description: Rent or book modern farming tools and machines easily. From tractors to seeders, access affordable equipment anytime through KrishiSanjivni.
features.warehouse_booking_description: Book secure, climate-controlled warehouses for safe crop storage. Track your warehouse bookings and manage availability online.
features.soil_testing_description: Submit your soil samples for analysis and receive accurate reports on nutrients, pH, and moisture ‚Äî helping you plan better crops and fertilizers.
features.ai_insights_description: Use our AI-powered Soil Check system to understand soil quality and get real-time recommendations for crop growth and sustainability.
features.ai_chatbot_description: Get 24/7 farming assistance ‚Äî weather updates, government scheme information, loan eligibility, and expert advice right from your chatbot.
features.farmer_community_description: Join a growing community of farmers, share experiences, and get help from agricultural experts and peers across the KrishiSanjivni network.

hero.title: Your Privacy Matters to Us
hero.description: At FarmHive, we are committed to safeguarding your personal data and maintaining your trust. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our platform.

privacy.intro1: This Privacy Policy outlines how FarmHive collects, uses, discloses, and protects information that identifies you personally.
privacy.intro2: By using FarmHive‚Äôs website, mobile app, or any related service, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.desc: We collect information to provide, improve, and personalize our agricultural services. This includes:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.item1: Name, email address, phone number, and location.
personal.item2: Account details such as username and password.
personal.item3: Identity verification or government-issued ID if applicable.

usage.title: Service Usage Information
usage.item1: Details about your tool or warehouse bookings.
usage.item2: Soil test results and farm data you upload.
usage.item5: Payment details processed through secure third-party gateways.
usage.item6: Device data such as browser type and app version.

tech.title: Technical Information
tech.item1: IP address, device identifiers, and access logs.
tech.item2: Cookies and analytics to improve service performance.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.desc: We use your data responsibly to make FarmHive efficient, personalized, and secure:
use.service: To deliver our farming, warehouse, and soil analysis services.
use.personalization: To provide personalized recommendations and insights.
use.communication: To send service updates, offers, and customer support messages.
use.platform: To maintain and improve platform functionality and user experience.
use.ai: To power AI-based suggestions and agricultural insights.
use.support: To prevent fraud, ensure compliance, and provide technical support.

security.title: Data Security
security.desc: We use advanced encryption, secure storage, and access controls to protect your information. However, no online transmission is 100% secure, and we encourage you to use strong passwords.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.desc: FarmHive uses cookies to remember your preferences, analyze traffic, and enhance user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.desc: You may access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also withdraw consent for certain processing activities by contacting us.

third.title: Third-Party Services
third.desc: We may share limited data with trusted third-party partners like payment gateways, analytics providers, and logistics companies to deliver seamless service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us at support@farmhive.in.

update.title: Policy Updates
update.desc1: FarmHive may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in technology, law, or services.
update.desc2: You will be notified of significant updates through email or platform notifications.

At KrishiSanjivni, we're committed to pr: At KrishiSanjivni, we're committed to protecting your personal information and being transparent about how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
Welcome to KrishiSanjivni! We understand: Welcome to KrishiSanjivni! We understand that trust is essential, especially when it comes to your personal and farming data. This Privacy Policy explains in simple terms how we handle your information when you use our platform for tool rentals, warehouse bookings, soil analysis, market insights, and more.
We believe in transparency and want you: We believe in transparency and want you to feel confident that your data is safe with us. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to our team.
To provide you with the best farming sol: To provide you with the best farming solutions, we collect the following types of information:
Name, email address, phone number, and l: Name, email address, phone number, and location

IP address and approximate location (for: IP address and approximate location (for localized services)
Usage patterns, pages visited, and time: Usage patterns, pages visited, and time spent on platform
We use your information to provide, impr: We use your information to provide, improve, and personalize your KrishiSanjivni experience:
Process tool rentals, warehouse bookings: Process tool rentals, warehouse bookings, and provide soil analysis results and recommendations.
Tailor market insights, weather updates,: Tailor market insights, weather updates, and farming advice based on your location and crop types.
Send important updates, alerts, booking: Send important updates, alerts, booking confirmations, and agricultural advisories.
Analyze usage patterns to enhance featur: Analyze usage patterns to enhance features, fix bugs, and develop new farming solutions.
Improve our AI assistant's responses usi: Improve our AI assistant's responses using anonymized conversation data.
Provide customer support and ensure plat: Provide customer support and ensure platform security and fraud prevention.
Your data security is our top priority. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
All data is encrypted in transit and at: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using bank-grade SSL/TLS protocols.
Data is stored on secure servers with re: Data is stored on secure servers with restricted access and regular security audits.
Strict authentication and authorization: Strict authentication and authorization protocols ensure only authorized personnel access data.
24/7 security monitoring and regular vul: 24/7 security monitoring and regular vulnerability assessments to prevent breaches.
Like most modern websites, we use cookie: Like most modern websites, we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
Required for basic platform functionalit: Required for basic platform functionality like login sessions and security features.
Remember your preferences, language sett: Remember your preferences, language settings, and personalized features.
Help us understand how you use KrishiSan: Help us understand how you use KrishiSanjivni so we can improve the platform.
You can manage cookie preferences throug: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect platform functionality.
You have full control over your personal: You have full control over your personal data. Here are your rights:
Request a copy of all personal informati: Request a copy of all personal information we hold about you.
Update or correct any inaccurate persona: Update or correct any inaccurate personal information.
Request permanent deletion of your accou: Request permanent deletion of your account and associated data.
Download your data in a portable, machin: Download your data in a portable, machine-readable format.
needHelpSupport: <0>Need help?</0> Contact our support team at <2>privacy@KrishiSanjivni.com</2> to exercise any of these rights.
To provide comprehensive farming solutio: To provide comprehensive farming solutions, we partner with trusted third-party services:
We use trusted meteorological services t: We use trusted meteorological services to provide accurate, hyper-local weather forecasts and alerts. Your location data is shared only to deliver relevant weather information.
Real-time Mandi prices and crop demand i: Real-time Mandi prices and crop demand insights are sourced from verified agricultural market data providers.
Secure payment processing for tool renta: Secure payment processing for tool rentals and warehouse bookings through industry-leading payment gateways. We do not store your payment card details.
Your data is stored on secure, GDPR-comp: Your data is stored on secure, GDPR-compliant cloud infrastructure with multiple backups and redundancy measures.
We carefully vet all third-party partner: We carefully vet all third-party partners and ensure they meet our strict privacy and security standards. We never sell your personal data to third parties.
Have questions about this Privacy Policy: Have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data? We're here to help!
mailingAddress: KrishiSanjivni Technologies Pvt. Ltd.<1/>Agricultural Innovation Center<1/>Sector 62, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201309<1/>India
We typically respond to privacy inquirie: We typically respond to privacy inquiries within 48 hours during business days. For urgent security concerns, please mark your email as "Urgent" in the subject line.
We may update this Privacy Policy from t: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, regulatory, or operational reasons. When we make significant changes, we'll notify you via email or through a prominent notice on our platform.
We encourage you to review this Privacy: We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we're protecting your information.
your trusted partner in modern farming s: your trusted partner in modern farming solutions.

We use cookies to enhance your experienc: We use cookies to enhance your experience on KrishiSanjivni and provide you with personalized services. This policy explains how and why we use cookies on our platform.
Cookies are small text files that are pl: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, or tablet) when you visit our website. They help us recognize your device, remember your preferences, and improve your overall experience on KrishiSanjivni.
By using cookies, we can provide you wit: By using cookies, we can provide you with a more personalized experience, analyze how our platform is used, and continuously improve our services to better serve the farming community.
You have the right to accept or reject c: You have the right to accept or reject cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer.
KrishiSanjivni uses different types of c: KrishiSanjivni uses different types of cookies to serve various purposes. Here's a breakdown of each type:
These cookies are necessary for the webs: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Without them, you won't be able to use basic features like logging in, accessing your account, or using our services.
These cookies allow us to remember your: These cookies allow us to remember your preferences and choices (like your preferred language, region, or display settings) to provide you with a more personalized experience.
These cookies help us understand how vis: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve the platform's performance and user experience.
These cookies track your online activity: These cookies track your online activity to help us deliver more relevant advertising and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. They may be set by our advertising partners.
These cookies are set by external servic: These cookies are set by external services we use on our website, such as analytics providers, social media platforms, and embedded content providers.
KrishiSanjivni uses cookies to enhance y: KrishiSanjivni uses cookies to enhance your experience and provide better services. Here's how we use them:
To keep you logged in securely and prote: To keep you logged in securely and protect your account from unauthorized access.
To remember your preferences, settings,: To remember your preferences, settings, and customizations, making your experience more tailored and efficient.
To analyze how users interact with our p: To analyze how users interact with our platform, identify popular features, and understand usage patterns to improve our services.
To identify bugs, test new features, and: To identify bugs, test new features, and optimize the platform based on real user behavior and feedback.
To show you relevant content, recommenda: To show you relevant content, recommendations, and advertisements that match your interests and farming needs.
In addition to our own cookies, we may a: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to enhance functionality and provide better services:
We use analytics services like Google An: We use analytics services like Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our website. These services use cookies to collect information about your usage patterns.
Google Analytics (tracking website traff: Google Analytics (tracking website traffic and user behavior)
Heat mapping tools (understanding how us: Heat mapping tools (understanding how users interact with pages)
Our website includes social media featur: Our website includes social media features that may set cookies to enable sharing and interaction.
We work with advertising partners who ma: We work with advertising partners who may use cookies to deliver relevant ads based on your interests.
Note: These third-party services have th: Note: These third-party services have their own privacy policies. We recommend reviewing their policies to understand how they collect and use your data.
You have full control over how cookies a: You have full control over how cookies are used on your device. Here's how you can manage your preferences:
Most web browsers allow you to control c: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
View which cookies are stored and delete: View which cookies are stored and delete them individually
Block all cookies from specific websites: Block all cookies from specific websites
Delete all cookies when you close your b: Delete all cookies when you close your browser
Blocking or deleting cookies may affect: Blocking or deleting cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of KrishiSanjivni. Some functionality may not work properly without cookies enabled.
By using KrishiSanjivni, you consent to: By using KrishiSanjivni, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this Cookie Policy.
When you first visit our website, you'll: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie consent banner where you can choose to accept or customize your preferences
Essential cookies will be placed automat: Essential cookies will be placed automatically as they're necessary for the website to function
Non-essential cookies (analytics, market: Non-essential cookies (analytics, marketing) will only be set after you give explicit consent
You can withdraw your consent or change: You can withdraw your consent or change your preferences at any time through your browser settings
If you do not wish to accept cookies, yo: If you do not wish to accept cookies, you can adjust your browser settings before using our website.
We may update this Cookie Policy from ti: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our business practices.
We will update the \"Last Updated\" date: We will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page
Significant changes will be communicated: Significant changes will be communicated through a notice on our website or via email
We encourage you to review this policy p: We encourage you to review this policy periodically
Continued use of our website after chang: Continued use of our website after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy
If you have any questions, concerns, or: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding our Cookie Policy or how we use cookies, please don't hesitate to contact us:
For more information about how we protec: For more information about how we protect your data and our platform terms, please review:
